DOC.brief_summary: Human milk best source enteral nutrition preterm infant . However infant first hour day life breastmilk mother usually available . Until May 2012 practice Neonatal Division Department Pediatrics /Medical University Vienna start formula feeding within first 6 hour life premature infant switch breastmilk soon available . In June 2012 investigator change feed regimen start use single donor milk mother preterm infant first hour day preterm infants life . In prospective observational study investigator evaluate impact single donor milk preterm infant time full enteral feeding , gastrointestinal tolerance NEC incidence preterm infant birthweight 1500 gram gestational 32 week . Data compare historical control group start preterm formula source enteral nutrition . The investigator hypothesize start enteral nutrition single donor milk mother preterm infant shorten time full enteral feeding .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Preterm Single Donor Milk Very Low Birth Weight Infants
DOC.criteria: low birth weight infant birthweight < 1500g Gestational Age < 32 week Informed consent major congenital malformation systemic metabolic disease short bowl syndrome gastrointestinal abnormality preterm infant transfer discharged
